column2:
Up/Down to change volume by 10%, Left/Right by 1%.
Press Jump to proceed.

Press Interact to rebind controls, or Jump to proceed.
(arrow keys to move, Z to jump, X to interact, and Enter to pause by default)
Press your UP key
Press your DOWN key
Press your LEFT key
Press your RIGHT key
Press your JUMP key
Press your INTERACT key
Press your PAUSE key
She/Her
Doe/Doe
You wake slowly, the ambience of the sea coming into focus. You feel somewhat sore all over.
Sand covers much of your front, unpleasant grit embedding itself into your skin.
After a moment to sit up, you look over yourself.
Your enormous belly heaves significantly in front of you, topped with breasts that might make a skinny person jealous, proportionately small though they may be.
Hoof-tipped arms droop halfway down your torso while holding them straight, difficult a maneuver as that is at such a size.
Your legs are dimpled, doughy columns that jiggle profusely on most movement.
Same as usual, and you don't spot anything concerning. Seems you're good.
...Might as well take a moment to squish your upper arm, too. Such a delightfully soft mass of blubber!
"...Are you okay?"
Startled, you swiftly turn around, taking a look at the voice's source, as well as the surroundings you've neglected.
